title: peer to peer transfer
body: what does it mean to allow it or disable it hint you can activate in your client at the beginning

replies.body:
The toggle for 'peer to peer' actually doesn't do anything anymore. It used to disable or enable Pando Media Booster, which was a peer-to-peer transfer service, but we stopped using it in the Client a long time ago.

Let me know if you have any questions.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=Y3pLeR6N,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-08-23T20:17:16.418+0000)
>
> The toggle for 'peer to peer' actually doesn't do anything anymore. It used to disable or enable Pando Media Booster, which was a peer-to-peer transfer service, but we stopped using it in the Client a long time ago.
> 
> Let me know if you have any questions.

actually thats about it  question is answered ty
